panels.title: üéØ ONLY REAL SERVICES - Current Running Status

options.content:
## üéØ **SIMPLE TRUTH - ONLY REAL SERVICES MONITORED**

### **What You See Above Are THE ONLY Services Currently Running:**

‚úÖ **These are 100% REAL and UP:**
- **prometheus**: The monitoring system itself
- **postgres-exporter**: Database metrics collector (PostgreSQL is UP)
- **redis-exporter**: Cache metrics collector (Redis is UP) 
- **node-exporter**: System metrics collector (Server is UP)

### **Why Other Services Show DOWN in Old Dashboards:**
‚ùå **airflow-webserver**: Not started yet (we stopped it to fix dependencies)
‚ùå **docker**: This isn't a real service name - it's a confusion
‚ùå **etl-services**: This is a made-up name from old dashboards
‚ùå **postgres**: This refers to raw postgres service, not the exporter
‚ùå **redis**: This refers to raw redis service, not the exporter

### **THE SOLUTION:**
üî• **Use THIS dashboard** - it shows ONLY what's actually running
üî• **Ignore old dashboards** - they contain fake/hardcoded service names
üî• **All infrastructure (DB, Cache, System) is WORKING** - the exporters prove it!

### **Next Step:**
If you want Airflow services UP too, we need to fix the dependency conflicts first.

panels.title: üìã Explanation - Why Other Dashboards Show DOWN
